text: Rex Smith may refer to: *Rex Smith (born 1955), American actor and singer *Rex Smith (American football) (1896 – 1972), National Football League player *Rex Smith (baseball) (1864–1895), born Henry W. Schmidt, a professional baseball player *Rex Smith Biplane, a pioneering biplane *Rex Smith, editor of the Albany Times Union since 2002
title: Rex Smith (disambiguation)
